item.title: JAVA8-Collectors API groupingByConcurrent、joining、mapping、maxby、minby
item.description: JAVA8-Collectors API: groupingByConcurrent、joining、mapping、maxby、minby# 前置数据 public static final List<Dish> menu = Arrays.asList( new Dish("pork", false, 800, Dish.Type.MEAT), new Dish("beef", false, 700, Dish.Type.MEAT), new Dish("chicken", false, 400, Dish.Type.MEAT), new Dish("french fries", true, 530, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("rice", true, 350, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("season fruit", true, 120, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("pizza", true, 550, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("prawns", false, 300, Dish.Type.FISH), new Dish("salmon", false, 450, Dish.Type.FISH)); 范例： 1、groupingByConcurrent 返回map为ConcurrentMap,按类型分组 public static void testGroupingByConcurrentWithFunction() { System.out.println("testGroupingByConcurrentWithFunction"); ConcurrentMap<Dish.Type, List<Dish>> collect = menu.
